Entries.default: "How dreadful it is to see the Defiant brought so low."
"Was such violence truly necessary? We hired them at some expense, you realize."
"Until the Defiant is seaworthy, I suppose you'd better try and track down that giant, dear."
"So many souls lost. Surely someone else survived."
"Nicely done, my lord. You'll have need of a crew if we're to get anywhere."
"The governor promised assistance. I'd say it's time to take him up on the offer."
